description: This file defines a class 'LocalFileSystemTools' that provides methods for writing to and reading from local files, including directory management and file extension handling.

classes.name: LocalFileSystemTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for handling local file system operations such as writing and reading files, with configurable target directory and default extension.

methods.name: write_file
methods.description: Writes content to a specified local file, creating directories if necessary, and returns the file path or error message.

methods.name: read_file
methods.description: Reads content from a specified local file, returning the content or a not found message.
